channel.title: Links on Sqvrltastic art archive
channel.description: Recent content in Links on Sqvrltastic art archive

item.title: Art resources links dump
item.description: Art resources links dump Last updated: January 30th 2025 Content warning for some mild artistic nudity in some links! Proko YouTube channel — feel like this is one of the best free resources out there for learning figure drawing PureRef — useful free little software for keeping and managing a reference board. Skull Sketcher v2 — small program that lets you spin and light a 3D model of a skull, useful for anatomy drawing practice.

item.title: Coding resources links dump
item.description: Coding resources links dump Last updated: February 13th 2025 MDN Web Docs — references and documentation on HTML, CSS and JavaScript; useful when you need to look up a particular tag or an attribute. W3Schools — similar to abovementioned MDN; lots of documentation and tutorials. ChatGPT — You don’t have to use it if you are against generative AI in all forms, but personally I think it can be helpful in supplementing your learning process.

item.title: My other projects
item.description: My other projects Simple Recipes — a minimalist cooking website for the lazy and easily distracted ones. Although, I treat it mostly as a personal cooking scrapbook of sorts.

item.title: Random
item.description: Random Last updated: January 30th 2025 Just some cool stuff, useful and not really. Wiby — search engine for old and indie websites. Human-made web button — 88x31 web button by Ash Kyd. Used to indicate that your content is not AI generated. Adopt a censor panda — collection of website graphics for displaying your website's age rating.

item.title: Useful software
item.description: Useful software Last updated: January 30th 2025 Also, be sure to check coding resources links and art resources links for more software recommendations! For desktop (Windows & Linux) Joplin — open source note-taking app. qBittorent — my open source torrent client of choice. Wintoys — I use this for some further Windows OS management. PowerToys — some extra utility features for Windows desktop. For Android F-Droid — installable app store of FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) applications for the Android platform.
